lead_paragraph: After a lackluster Triple Crown season, racing’s 3-year-olds get another shot in Saturday’s Jim Dandy and Sunday’s Haskell Invitational.
snippet: After a lackluster Triple Crown season, racing’s 3-year-olds get another shot in Saturday’s Jim Dandy and Sunday’s Haskell Invitational.
